citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The inside runs with shavings for females and puppies are not being spot cleaned daily causing a build up of feces and
urine soaked shavings on the floor. The whelping box housing a pug had several days’ worth of feces in the box that was
not removed. These enclosures must be spot cleaned daily to keep the animals from becoming soiled and for their
comfort.
Correct by: Feb 16, 2024

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
In general, there is a lot of dust, debris and clutter around the kennel that needs to be cleaned. Areas between the
whelping boxes and the wall had excess dust and cobwebs that need to be removed. There were multiple items (used
syringes, bottles etc.) stored on top of a whelping box that were covered in dust and there were miscellaneous items
stored around the food supplies and spilled food on the floor that was not removed. All this clutter, dust and debris need to
be addressed to keep the kennel clean to promote good housekeeping practices.
Correct by: Feb 17, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.11(a) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
The inside runs with shavings for females and puppies are not being spot cleaned daily causing a build up of feces and 
urine soaked shavings on the floor. The whelping box housing a pug had several days’ worth of feces in the box that was 
not removed. These enclosures must be spot cleaned daily to keep the animals from becoming soiled and for their 
comfort. 
Correct by: Feb 16, 2024 
3.11(c) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
In general, there is a lot of dust, debris and clutter around the kennel that needs to be cleaned. Areas between the 
whelping boxes and the wall had excess dust and cobwebs that need to be removed. There were multiple items (used 
syringes, bottles etc.) stored on top of a whelping box that were covered in dust and there were miscellaneous items 
stored around the food supplies and spilled food on the floor that was not removed. All this clutter, dust and debris need to 
be addressed to keep the kennel clean to promote good housekeeping practices.  
Correct by: Feb 17, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
